about-section.res-1: A software developer with over 3 years of experience, specializing in JavaScript/TypeScript and React. Proven track record in telecommunications projects, including the development of IVR, CRM, and custom SMS distribution systems for marketing campaigns. Expertise in telecommunications carriers such as Twilio, a virtual number system capable of linking web calls with clients and internal services.
about-section.res-2: A software developer with over 3 years of experience, specializing in JavaScript/TypeScript and React. Proven track record in telecommunications projects, including the development of IVR, CRM, and custom SMS distribution systems for marketing campaigns. Expertise in telecommunications carriers such as Twilio, a virtual number system capable of linking web calls with clients and internal services.
about-section.res-2.1: Effective leadership of development teams with successful outcomes for clients and employers. Passionate about programming and committed to delivering high-quality solutions. Skilled in developing backend endpoints to support project requirements.
about-section.res-2.2: As a Project Manager, successfully led a team of 6 in developing telecommunications solutions and integrations that have been effective and delivered promptly to clients. Adept at handling emergencies and delegating responsibilities as required by clients.

hobbies-section.hobbies: I am a proactive person and always look for ways to improve my skills and knowledge. For example, I love reading and learning about the latest programming trends. I am also patient and perseverant, which has helped me overcome complex challenges in previous projects. Additionally, my experience playing classical music in string ensembles has taught me to work in a team and communicate effectively with others.
hobbies-section.hobbies-1.1: I enjoy reading and keeping up to date with the latest programming trends, which helps me acquire new knowledge.
hobbies-section.hobbies-1.2: I enjoy reading and keeping up to date with the latest programming trends, which helps me acquire new knowledge.
hobbies-section.hobbies-2.1: I have overcome complex challenges in previous projects by being patient and persevering.
hobbies-section.hobbies-3.1: My experience playing classical music in string ensembles has taught me how to work in a team and communicate effectively with others.
hobbies-section.hobbies-4.1: I enjoy spending time in wooded areas, which helps me maintain a balance between my personal and professional life, as well as fostering my creativity and capacity for reflection.

goals-section.goals: I aim to continue advancing my career as a software developer by learning new technologies and methodologies.
goals-section.goals-1: I aspire to contribute to open-source projects and collaborate with the broader development community.
goals-section.goals-2: My long-term objective is to become a proficient full-stack developer and work on projects that drive positive societal impact.
